participant_1.background:
I spent a week in Mexico eating all of the Mexican food I could find.
i live in a medium sized city.
I spend time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
I drive an expensive car that I bought with my own money.
in the evenings i watch the door at a club where they play punkrock.

participant_2.background:
I am close with my family, though I can be a bit overbearing at times.
i have never met my father.
I'm constantly tripping over my own feet, but I'm determined to make it as a wedding planner.
my favorite basketball team is the vancouver grizzlies.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.

content.text: Hey, I'm John. What's your name?
Hi, I'm Jessica. What do you do for fun?
I spend a lot of time with my alpacas, they help me feel better.
That's interesting. I've never met an alpaca.
You should come visit my farm sometime!
I would love to! I'm always looking for new experiences.
I'm also a huge fan of punk rock music. Do you like it?
I'm not really into punk rock, but I do like a lot of different types of music.
That's cool. I like to watch the door at a punk rock club in the evenings.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I'm not much of a club person, but I can appreciate the music.
I'm also a wedding planner. I'm really passionate about it, even though I'm constantly tripping over my own feet.
That's so cool! I've never met a wedding planner before.
It's a lot of fun, but it can be stressful too.
I'm sure it is. But it's great that you're so passionate about it.
Thanks! I'm glad you think so.
